information: SDTN-KREPELEK is a company based in Brittany founded in 2000 that specializes in supplying automatic lines for making all batter-based products (Crêpes, Waffles, Pancakes, Blinis Bricks, Diouls, Omelettes, Spring Rolls, Samosas, Blintze, Injera, Nalesniki, Krokieti, Oladi, Palatschinken, Pfannkuchen….•Cooking on a cast iron ring•Cooking on a cylinder or heated conveyor for strips of pastry to be filled.•Filling, folding, rolling, stacking, cooling techniques
